name: The end of the wor(l)d
description:
part of colab project in the wrong biennale 5

What end of the world is more famous than the falling of the meteorite that killed the dinosaurs? What is better rehearsal than our own life? Only in this case, not ours, but a dinosaur, who needs to have time to say as much as possible by the end of the world.

Live some stages of a dinosaur's life with him and help him learn new words by playing 4 different mini-games. However, you need to remember that the end of the world is near.

The meteorite will fall anyway.

But it depends only on you how much the dinosaur has time to do and learn
